attributes.action: Implement changes to our national education syllabus which highlight dangers of an authoritarian Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am disturbed at the level of dumbing down this generation has received.  
As such I think it is now necessary for action to be taken to counter this by adding literature to our national education syllabus.  
I look forward to UK Governments response to agree or disagree for changes to our national education syllabus which address the dangers of an authoritarian government.  I suggest the following pieces added as an area of study/debate:

1> 1984 - Author: George Orwell
2> Animal Farm - Author: George Orwell

It must be made absolutely clear the dangers of an authoritarian government.  
I am sure as our government clearly agree with the dangers of such a government - an internal terrorism, as warned by US President Eisenhower, General MacArthur et al.  As such I am sure they will back this 100% without feign or delay.
